attributes.action: Withdraw the offer of a £1.5 Bn donation to aid climate finance funding...
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
...for developing countries until:-
1) It has been proven without reservation that MMGW is based on FACT.
2) It will be proven that the countries benefiting from this will use it for its intended purpose.
3) WE can afford to spare this amount of money.
